mapper.insert: insert report (id, name, aid, rpttype, mid, did, uid, starttime, endtime, logic, description, createdTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{aid}, #{reportType}, #{mid}, #{did}, #{uid}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{logic}, #{description},now())
mapper.select: select id, name, aid, rpttype, mid, did, uid, logic, description, starttime, endtime, createdTime from report where id = #{id}
select id, name, aid, rpttype, mid, did, uid, logic, description, starttime, endtime, createdTime from report where aid = #{aid}
mapper.update: update report set rpttype=#{reportType} where id = #{id}
update report set logic=#{logic} where id = #{id}
update report set starttime=#{starttime} and endtime=#{endtime} where id = #{id}
